parameters.name: AcceleratorType
parameters.description:
The accelerator type.

*   CPU: Only CPU computing is used.
*   GPU: GPUs are used to accelerate computing.

parameters.name: Accessibility
parameters.description:
The accessibility. Valid values:

*   PRIVATE (default): The instances are accessible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
*   PUBLIC: The instances are accessible only to all members in the workspace.

parameters.name: CreateUserId
parameters.description: The UID of the creator.

parameters.name: GpuType
parameters.description: The GPU type.

parameters.name: ImageName
parameters.description: The image name.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call [ListInstances](~~470439~~) to obtain the instance ID.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The instance name.

parameters.name: Labels
parameters.description: The labels. A maximum of four labels are supported.

parameters.name: MaxCpu
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPUs. Unit: 0.001 CPU. The value 1000 indicates one CPU.

parameters.name: MaxGpu
parameters.description: The maximum number of GPUs. Unit: 0.001 GPU. The value 1000 indicates one GPU.

parameters.name: MaxGpuMemory
parameters.description: The maximum memory size per GPU card. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: MaxMemory
parameters.description: The maximum memory size. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: MinCpu
parameters.description: The minimum number of CPUs. Unit: 0.001 CPU. The value 1000 indicates one CPU.

parameters.name: MinGpu
parameters.description: The minimum number of GPUs. Unit: 0.001 GPU. The value 1000 indicates one GPU.

parameters.name: MinGpuMemory
parameters.description: The minimum memory size per GPU card. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: MinMemory
parameters.description: The minimum memory size. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order that you use to sort the query results.

Valid values:

*   ASC
*   DESC

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: PaymentType
parameters.description:
The billing method.

Valid values:

*   PayAsYouGo
*   Subscription

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. If you leave this parameter empty, the instances in the pay-as-you-go resource group are queried. If you set this parameter to ALL, all instances are queried.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field that you use to sort the query results.

Valid values:

*   Priority
*   GmtCreateTime
*   GmtModifiedTime

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The instance status.

Valid values:

*   Creating
*   SaveFailed
*   Stopped
*   Failed
*   ResourceAllocating
*   Stopping
*   Updating
*   Saving
*   Queuing
*   Recovering
*   Starting
*   Running
*   Saved
*   Deleting
*   EnvPreparing

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
